summary: A configuration container that encapsulates all architectural hyper‑parameters for a Donut Swin transformer model, such as image resolution, patch size, embedding dimensions, layer depths, attention heads, dropout rates, activation functions and positional embedding options. It inherits from a generic pretrained‑model config class, allowing the settings to be passed directly to the model constructor to create a fully defined Donut model.
business_intent: Provide a flexible, reproducible way for developers and researchers to specify and tweak the structural settings of a Donut document‑understanding model, enabling easy instantiation, sharing and fine‑tuning of models with custom vision transformer architectures.
